ValidationRule.description: Cannot move Defleet status to Transport without Defleet Ready Check equals Ready
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL( Infleet_status__c , "Transport"), defleetReadyCheck__c = "Not Ready", ISPICKVAL( Defleet_Transport_Booked__c , ""), ISPICKVAL( Vehicle_status__c , "00- - Car is defleeted") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot move Defleet status without filling necessary fields
